title: "The vast majority of players love Dynamic Queue" - Riot Lyte

embed.description: First and foremost, we aren't ignoring feedback at all. The OP has been extremely negative most of the week, and we're looking for constructive...

body: Id like to know how exactly you came to this conclusion.

replies.body:
With... data? 

Or do you think anecdotes are more important?

I know every person I've talked to in person is over the moon about Dynamic Queue. Surveying those players (as oppose to only listening to those that stalk Reddit or the Boards) seems like it would naturally lead to more people liking Dynamic Queue than disliking it.

Specifically by "reading Boards, Reddit, [and] looking at in-game data".

it is right there in the post...

As a comment perfectly highlighted, Dynamic Queue launched with the new champion select and that's a big factor on the high playrate of the dynamic Queue. Also, the fact that they play a lot on it is because they don't really havea choice on the matter. With dynamic Queue, team ranked is also gone and some people don't play normals at all so.. they don't really have a choice... Give us Solo/Duo and Dynamic for a week and with both having the new champ select. Then you will see what people want more...

> [{quoted}](name=Hamil Battar,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=VLb1MFPz,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-01-20T01:04:21.913+0000)
>
> As a comment perfectly highlighted, Dynamic Queue launched with the new champion select and that's a big factor on the high playrate of the dynamic Queue. Also, the fact that they play a lot on it is because they don't really havea choice on the matter. With dynamic Queue, team ranked is also gone and some people don't play normals at all so.. they don't really have a choice... Give us Solo/Duo and Dynamic for a week and with both having the new champ select. Then you will see what people want more...

hell ye plus 1

They're creating a True Solo Queue.

I predict the majority of players will funnel into that instead of playing the current Forced Team Queue.

Was looking up Lyte aka Jeffrey Lin to see what publications he got for his Ph.D. work and the main thing I came across was:

Morbidity and recurrence with modifications of radical vulvectomy and groin dissection
Jeffrey Y. Lin,

Not sure if it's the same person, but based on dynamic queue I could see him being into groin dissection. Sure feels like a swift kick to the nuts after the solid work of team builder.
What do you think the minority of players crying on reddit and on the forums represents the over 1 million player fanbase?
Sure therr are things to tweak. But overall i like the new system.
